name: Zoom Background Mixer
description:
A tool for making 4-up connected zoom backgrounds.


Drop an image into the main source component to split it into 4 different exportable images to spread a single background across 4 speakers, get creative and use a secondary component to overlay effects across the images to enhance theatrics for skits and more!


Next updates will support 2, 4, 6, and 8, and 10 up!
